name: Dungeon-action-roguelike
description:
Hi this is my first game in unity , i followed this guide : 

For the art its this asset : https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset and the rest will be made by me.

I implemented a random dungeon generator so for now you can go and fight simple  monster in an infinite dungeon , in the future i will add items, ranged attack, different enemies , and more.

also there is no sound effect for now but they will be implemented in the future.

Input : wasd or zqsd and left mouse click .
